Description: Book of the Dead of Tentameniy; sheet 6; vignettes in red and black; Hieratic text in seven columns.
Curator's comments: Published: Mosher, The Papyrus of Hor, (2001), pl.20.2, 23.1, p.14 n.72, p.76 n.16 & 17, p.79 n.20, p.84 n.23-5, p.88 n.14, p.89 n.38. Fragments apparently of this papyrus are registered as EA 76474. Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (258)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57229) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57229)
